sentences.en: A positive response consists in the rapid precipitation of the characteristic weakness and associated symptoms.
sentences.cn: 阳性反应为迅速发生特有的无力及其有关的症状.

sentences.en: Abundant precipitation is more important than extreme cold.
sentences.cn: 丰富的降雪量比酷寒更为重要.

sentences.en: Aerial photography can provide valuable information on precipitation, evapotraspiration, interception, and runoff.
sentences.cn: 航空摄影可提供有关降水量 、 蒸发蒸腾量 、 入渗和径流量的有价值的资料.

sentences.en: Clouds are sometimes seeded with silver iodide to induce precipitation.
sentences.cn: 人们有时在云里播撒碘化银,以诱使降雨.

sentences.en: Guitar's experiments did not stimulate any practical study of the electrostatic - precipitation principle.
sentences.cn: 吉他的试验均未能激起任何关于电收尘原理的实用性研究.

sentences.en: Heavy vegetation may intercept a large amount of precipitation on its leaves.
sentences.cn: 浓密的植被的叶子中能截留大量的降水.

sentences.en: Nearly all the precipitation that falls on the earth results from the cooling of rising air.
sentences.cn: 几乎落到地球上的所有降水都是由于上升空气的冷却.

sentences.en: Oxidation - reduction reactions are important in the solubilization and precipitation of iron and manganese.
sentences.cn: 氧化还原反应在铁和锰的增溶和沉淀中具有重要作用.

sentences.en: Such crystals are thus efficient condensation nuclei and so promote precipitation from a cloud.
sentences.cn: 这种晶体是有效的凝聚核,从而促使云变雨降落.

sentences.en: Techniques for controlling particulates include filtering, washing, centrifugal separation, and electrostatic precipitation.
sentences.cn: 控制颗粒污染物的技术包括过滤 、 洗涤 、 离心分离 、 静电沉降.

sentences.en: The actual practice of electrical precipitation involves a surprising number of scientific disciplines.
sentences.cn: 在实践中,电收尘涉及到许多科学领域.

sentences.en: The quantity of precipitation varies greatly from year to year in these regions.
sentences.cn: 在这些地区每年降雨量的变化很大.

sentences.en: There is generally more evaporation over the oceans and more precipitation over the land.
sentences.cn: 通常在海洋蒸发量较大,而陆地上则降水量较大.

sentences.en: Various substances in plant extracts may cause spontaneous or non - specific precipitation.
sentences.cn: 植物提取液中的各种物质都可能引起自发的或 非 专化性的沉淀.

words.tran_cn: 勇往直前的；急促的；突如其来的
突如其来的；猛地落下的；急促的
起沉淀作用的；急落的；猛冲的
[化学] 沉淀剂，[矿业] 沉淀器；催促的人
[化学] 沉淀；猛地落下；冷凝成为雨或雪等
使沉淀；促成；猛抛；使陷入

phrases.tran_cn: 大气降水，大气沉降；降水

trans.tran_cn: 匆促，沉淀，（雨等）降落，某地区降雨等的量
trans.tran_en: rain, snow etc that falls on the ground, or the amount of rain, snow etc that falls
